description: You usually need a pair of sports shoes for your casual trips & the primary considerations are comfort, near weightlessness & some style.This is my third Reebok pair & on all these parameters, Reebok always lives out to expectations without pinching the pocket like an Adidas or a Nike. An additional bonus was the surprise additional discount Flipkart offered me when I was ready to pay out, bringing down the price further to sub INR 1800. That was the real icing on the cake for me in the transaction.
Hi, i like this product after wearing when i go with friends everyone is saying very nice shoes so what else u needed,it reebok so its comfortable no doubt on it.thanks for quick delivery flipkart.
Light weighted shoes good looks and comfortable to wear.good for running and walkingDelivery was OK could have been better
the shoes are light weight and comfortable.good for running and jogging .very attractive.the delivery of shoes was good  delivered withing 3 days .
very lite weighted shoes good for sports as well casual wear..also satisfied with the delivery service delivered in 3 days
A perfectly fine shoe. Equivalent to another shoe worth 3-4 thousands. Its gonna easily last for more than a year.
Very light on pocket and light by weight .Easy to walk at speeds and soft soul comfort to go for distance walks
My friend got this. There was an offer going on and we grabbed it. Totally worth the money. Looked great.
